modules.name: Tech Lead
modules.description: Principal Software Architect - coordinates all agents, architectural decisions, code review
modules.longDescription: The Tech Lead agent serves as the principal coordinator for all development activities. It makes high-level architectural decisions, conducts code reviews, and ensures all other agents work cohesively toward project goals.
whatItDoes: Coordinates work between different engineering agents
Makes architectural decisions and ensures consistency
Reviews code for quality, patterns, and best practices
modules.whenToUse: Essential for any project. This is the orchestrating agent that manages all others.

modules.name: Product Functional
modules.description: Creates PDR (Product Definition Reports) with user requirements and functional specs
modules.longDescription: Translates business needs into detailed Product Definition Reports (PDR). Focuses on user stories, acceptance criteria, and functional specifications without diving into technical implementation.
whatItDoes: Defines acceptance criteria and success metrics
Identifies edge cases and user flows
Prioritizes features based on business value
modules.whenToUse: When starting new features or projects that need clear requirements definition.

modules.name: Product Technical
modules.description: Technical analysis, architecture design, task breakdown from PDR
modules.longDescription: Takes functional requirements from PDR and transforms them into technical specifications. Designs system architecture, creates task breakdowns, and defines technical acceptance criteria.
whatItDoes: Analyzes PDR and creates technical specifications
Designs system architecture and data models
Breaks down features into actionable development tasks
Defines API contracts and integration points
modules.whenToUse: After Product Functional creates the PDR, use this to plan the technical implementation.

modules.name: Hono Engineer
modules.description: Backend API development with Hono framework
modules.longDescription: Specialized in building high-performance APIs using the Hono framework. Creates RESTful endpoints, handles middleware, and implements business logic with TypeScript.
whatItDoes: Creates RESTful API endpoints with Hono
Implements middleware for auth, validation, logging
Integrates with database and external services
Implements error handling and response formatting
modules.whenToUse: When building backend APIs with Hono framework. For Express, Fastify, or NestJS, use the respective agents.

modules.name: DB Drizzle Engineer
modules.description: Database design and development with Drizzle ORM
modules.longDescription: Expert in database design and implementation using Drizzle ORM. Handles schema design, migrations, queries, and database optimization with a focus on type safety.
modules.whenToUse: When using Drizzle ORM for database access. For Prisma or other ORMs, use respective agents.

modules.name: Node TypeScript Engineer
modules.description: Shared packages and Node.js TypeScript development
modules.longDescription: Develops shared TypeScript packages, utilities, and core business logic. Focuses on code reusability, type safety, and clean architecture patterns.
modules.whenToUse: For any shared code, utilities, or packages that are used across different parts of the application.

modules.name: Astro Engineer
modules.description: Astro framework development for static/SSR sites
modules.longDescription: Builds fast, content-focused websites using Astro. Specializes in static site generation, partial hydration, and integrating with various UI frameworks.
modules.whenToUse: When building content-focused websites, blogs, or marketing sites with Astro.

modules.name: TanStack Start Engineer
modules.description: TanStack Start/Router development for admin dashboards
modules.longDescription: Expert in TanStack Start and Router for building type-safe, full-stack React applications. Specializes in admin dashboards and complex data-driven interfaces.
whatItDoes: Implements server functions with TanStack Start
modules.whenToUse: When building admin panels or complex React applications with TanStack Start/Router.

modules.name: React Senior Dev
modules.description: React component development and UI architecture
modules.longDescription: Senior-level React developer focused on component architecture, state management, and UI best practices. Builds reusable, accessible, and performant components.
whatItDoes: Builds accessible UI with proper ARIA
Creates component libraries and design systems
modules.whenToUse: For any React-based frontend development, component libraries, or UI architecture.

modules.name: UX/UI Designer
modules.description: User experience and interface design
modules.longDescription: Designs user experiences and interfaces following modern design principles. Creates wireframes, mockups, and design specifications for development teams.
modules.whenToUse: When designing new features or improving existing user interfaces.

modules.name: QA Engineer
modules.description: Quality assurance, testing strategy, test automation
modules.longDescription: Ensures software quality through comprehensive testing strategies. Designs test plans, writes automated tests, and validates feature implementations.
whatItDoes: Writes unit, integration, and E2E tests
modules.whenToUse: Essential for maintaining code quality. Use throughout development for TDD and after features for validation.

modules.name: Debugger
modules.description: Bug investigation, root cause analysis, debugging
modules.longDescription: Specialized in investigating and resolving bugs. Performs root cause analysis, traces execution flows, and implements fixes with minimal side effects.
whatItDoes: Investigates bug reports and reproduces issues
Traces code execution and data flow
Adds regression tests for fixed bugs
modules.whenToUse: When investigating bugs, unexpected behavior, or production issues.

modules.name: Tech Writer
modules.description: Technical documentation, API docs, user guides
modules.longDescription: Creates clear, comprehensive technical documentation. Writes API documentation, user guides, tutorials, and maintains project documentation.
modules.whenToUse: When creating or updating documentation, API docs, or user guides.

modules.name: SEO AI Specialist
modules.description: SEO optimization, content strategy, AI-assisted content
modules.longDescription: Optimizes content and code for search engines. Creates SEO strategies, implements meta tags, structured data, and generates AI-assisted content.
whatItDoes: Creates meta tags and structured data
modules.whenToUse: When building public-facing websites that need search engine visibility.

modules.name: Prisma Engineer
modules.description: Database design and development with Prisma ORM
modules.longDescription: Expert in database design using Prisma ORM. Handles schema design, migrations, type-safe queries, and database optimization across multiple database engines.
whatItDoes: Writes type-safe queries with Prisma Client
modules.whenToUse: When using Prisma ORM for database access. For Drizzle or other ORMs, use respective agents.

modules.name: Express Engineer
modules.description: Backend API development with Express.js
modules.longDescription: Specialized in building REST APIs with Express.js. Creates modular routes, middleware chains, and implements robust error handling with TypeScript.
whatItDoes: Creates RESTful API endpoints with Express
Implements middleware for auth, validation, logging
Handles async errors and HTTP status codes
modules.whenToUse: When building backend APIs with Express.js. For Hono, Fastify, or NestJS, use the respective agents.

modules.name: Next.js Engineer
modules.description: Full-stack development with Next.js App Router
modules.longDescription: Expert in Next.js App Router for building full-stack React applications. Handles Server Components, Server Actions, and data fetching patterns.
whatItDoes: Creates pages with App Router architecture
Builds Server Actions for form handling
Handles SSR, SSG, and ISR patterns
modules.whenToUse: When building full-stack React applications with Next.js. For pure React SPAs, consider TanStack Start.

modules.name: Fastify Engineer
modules.description: High-performance API development with Fastify
modules.longDescription: Builds high-performance APIs with Fastify's plugin architecture. Uses schema-based validation for automatic type inference and OpenAPI docs.
whatItDoes: Creates typed routes with schema validation
modules.whenToUse: When building high-performance APIs with Fastify. Excellent for microservices and high-throughput applications.

modules.name: NestJS Engineer
modules.description: Enterprise backend development with NestJS
modules.longDescription: Builds scalable enterprise applications with NestJS. Uses dependency injection, modular architecture, and enterprise patterns like CQRS.
modules.whenToUse: When building enterprise-scale applications that need strong architecture and dependency injection.

modules.name: Mongoose Engineer
modules.description: MongoDB development with Mongoose ODM
modules.longDescription: Expert in MongoDB with Mongoose ODM. Designs document schemas, writes aggregation pipelines, and implements NoSQL best practices.
whatItDoes: Optimizes with indexes and query patterns
modules.whenToUse: When using MongoDB as your database. For SQL databases, use Prisma or Drizzle agents.
